Nym's F-Droid Repo

This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built Nym.

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nymtech/fdroid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
06 C0 95 C5 4B BF E1 47 C9 86 FD 29 AD F4 E9 BC D5 E9 5E CA CD 6D 86 5C 60 45 B6 6B 0B 55 00 FB
